text: pasting this here.  <@U0K8ZSHN0> knows whatâ€™s up cuz we riffed last evening.  Everyone else following along, this is the current shape of the PMMC

file.name: -.txt
file.title: Untitled
file.preview:
What Rick says here matches my read of the situation as well:

"I'm thinking that the initial cohort is very much like early PIE. No formal equity stake. Just PMMC giving free rent and mentorship in exchange for founders serving as guinea pigs for PMMC and real-world users for AD (and others) to monitor and engage. We all get smarter and the founders get support and community."

Participation is of mutual benefit to cohorts and PMMC.  Autodesk gets a place in the community, access to users, feedback on tools and we are incubating future clients and customers!

What Rick says here matches my read of the situation as well:


"I'm thinking that the initial cohort is very much like early PIE. No formal equity stake. Just PMMC giving free rent and mentorship in exchange for founders serving as guinea pigs for PMMC and real-world users for AD (and others) to monitor and engage. We all get smarter and the founders get support and community."




Participation is of mutual benefit to cohorts and PMMC.  Autodesk gets a place in the community, access to users, feedback on tools and we are incubating future clients and customers!
